main event: A witness observed a disc-shaped object hovering and moving erratically for approximately 45 minutes on April 27, 1963, in Pearl Beach, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was observed through a 4lx telescope,The sighting took place in daylight conditions,The object appeared and disappeared quickly,The witness described three bright lights in a triangular formation during a separate sighting,The total duration of the main sighting was 45 minutes.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with three bright lights in a triangular formation
witness description: a private citizen not connected with any governmental agency
